wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Edward Goudge (4 March 1935 Prestwich, Greater Manchester, England– 7 November 2010 Devon, United Kingdom) was a British athlete who competed in the  400m hurdles at the 1960 Summer Olympic Games in Rome.
